casebody.data:
DEWA MARON v. GIRARD TRUST COMPANY, EXECUTOR, et al. [No. 32,

April Term, 1935]

Decided June 18th, 1935.

The cause was argued before Bond, C. J., Urner, Ofputt, Sloan, Mitchell, Shehan, and Johnson, JJ.

John B. Gest, for the appellant. George M. Brady, with whom were Eugene A. Edgett and Maloy, Brady & Yost, on the brief, for the appellees. Sloan, J.,

delivered the opinion of the Court.
